content: --मम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} free from all connection with the outer world, who has renounced all worldly ties; संसारमिव निर्ममः (ततार) <ls>R. 12. 60</ls>; <ls>Bg. 2. 71</ls>; <ls n="Bg.">3. 30.</ls> {2} unselfish, disinterested. {3} indifferent to (with <ab>loc.</ab>); निर्ममे निर्ममोऽर्थेषु मथुरां मधुराकृतिः <ls>R. 15. 28</ls>; प्राप्तेष्वर्थेषु निर्ममाः <ls>Mb.</ls> {4} an epithet of Śiva.
